emailTemplate.emailSubject: User Registration Confirmation Email to Confirm Users
emailTemplate.templateBody:
Email to confirm your registration.

This email is sent to you to confirm your registration.If you did not request for registration,please ignore this email.


Please click below link to confirm your registration:



{{ userRegistrationConfirm.message }}

emailTemplate.emailSubject: Email to Confirm Unblocking of your account
emailTemplate.templateBody:
Email to UnBlock your blocked account.

This email is sent to you to unblock your login account.If you did not request for Unblocking your account,please ignore this email.


Please click below link to unblock your account:



{{ userUnBlock.message }}

emailTemplate.emailSubject: Email Response to confirm your interest
emailTemplate.templateBody:
Email to confirm your Interest.

This email is sent to you in order to confirm your interest.We are very happy that you are interested in our organization. Our representative will get to you very soon. Thank You!!!

If you have not shown interest in our organization,please ignore this email.


Please click below link to confirm your registration:

Email to express interest in our organization.

Mr./Mrs {{ interestedPeople.name }} has shown interest in our organization.He/She can be contacted through email " {{ interestedPeople.email }}. "


He/She has left the following message:

{{ interestedPeople.message }}

Email to confirm change of your account password.

This email is sent to you in order to confirm your password change action.If you did not request for password change,please ignore this email.


Please click below link to confirm your password change action:



{{ passwordChange.message }}
emailTemplate.emailSubject: Email to Verify password Change action
